path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Pulbic Audit Report - LiveTrade Token and Treasury - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: LTDTreasuryVester.sol - Unsafe using transfer method through IERC20 interface
findings.description: Using `transfer` method in `claim` function may cause issues when transferring tokens and it's recommended to use SafeERC20 library for IERC20 and change all transfer, transferFrom methods to safeTransfer, safeTransferFrom.

findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: The finding indicates a potential Denial of Service vulnerability due to an unexpected revert, which can cause the contract to become unresponsive or crash.

findings.title: Gas Usage, Gas Limit and Loops
findings.description: Potential DoS vulnerability due to inefficient gas usage, inadequate gas limit settings, or unoptimized loops.

findings.title: Redundant fallback function
findings.description: The contract has a redundant fallback function which can cause unnecessary gas usage.

findings.title: Explicit visibility of functions state variables (external, internal, private and public)
findings.description: Functions or state variables are declared with explicit visibility modifiers (public, external, internal, or private) which could lead to security vulnerabilities.
